definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Finally, we build a UGM model for the output of coal of Fengfeng Coal Mine.
sentences.chinese: 應用該方法對峯峯礦務局煤炭產量建了UGM模型。

sentences.english: Trials were made in Mugang Mine, Liuzhi Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 此方法已在六枝礦務局木崗煤礦進行了試用。
